title: Insert Interval
description:
You are given an array of non-overlapping intervals sorted in ascending order by start, and a new interval.

Insert the new interval into the intervals such that the intervals are still sorted and non-overlapping (merge overlapping intervals if necessary).

Return the resulting array of intervals.

Example:
  Input: intervals = [[1,3],[6,9]], newInterval = [2,5]
  Output: [[1,5],[6,9]]
